item.title: 印度投资者关注证券交易委员会会议，衍生品管制迫在眉睫
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 隆巴欧迪抛售全部中国资产配置，不买反弹行情
item.description: Michael Strobaek 于 11 月加入 Lombard Odier 担任首席投资官，他的第一个重大举措就是出售为私人客户管理的所有中国股票和债券。【原文：When Michael Strobaek joined Lombard Odier as chief investment officer in November, one of his first big moves was to sell all the China stocks and bonds in its holdings managed for private clients.】

item.title: 海伦飓风导致家禽养殖厂停产，山核桃树受损
item.description: 由于洪水淹没了美国南部，飓风 "海伦 "导致鸡肉加工厂停产，一些鸡群严重受损，山核桃树被冲倒，棉花作物被压扁。【原文：Hurricane Helene has halted chicken processing plants and caused severe damage to some flocks, while also downing pecan trees and flattening cotton crops, as floodwaters swamped the southern US.】

item.title: 前新加坡石油大亨林氏将向清算人支付 35 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，林翁权（Lim Oon Kuin）倒闭的石油贸易帝国的清算人将从这位倒下的大亨及其子女那里收回约 35 亿美元，以结束新加坡的民事诉讼。【原文：The liquidators of Lim Oon Kuin’s collapsed oil trading empire are set to recover about $3.5 billion from the fallen tycoon and his children in order to end a Singapore civil lawsuit, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国股市创 2015 年以来最大涨幅，即将步入牛市
item.description: 中国股市延续了历史上最引人注目的转折之一，连续第九天飙升，因为政府的刺激政策吸引投资者重返全球最疲软的市场之一。【原文：Chinese stocks extended one of their most remarkable turnarounds in history, soaring for a ninth straight day as government stimulus entices investors back to one of the most beaten-down markets worldwide.】

item.title: 印度监管机构将遏制期权热潮，因为风险丛生
item.description: 印度证券市场监管机构将考虑制定规则，限制该国衍生品交易的激增，熟悉内情的人士说，此前越来越多的散户参与，使投机性押注达到了世界最高水平。【原文：India’s securities market regulator will consider rules to limit a surge in derivatives trading in the nation, people familiar with the matter said, after growing retail participation took the speculative bets to the highest in the world.】

item.title: 韩国芯片库存以 2009 年以来最快速度减少
item.description: 上个月，韩国的半导体库存以 2009 年以来最快的速度减少，表明对人工智能开发中使用的高性能存储芯片的需求持续增长。【原文：South Korea’s semiconductor stockpiles dwindled at the fastest clip since 2009 last month in a sign of sustained demand for high-performance memory chips used in artificial intelligence development.】

item.title: 新加坡奄奄一息的 IPO 市场向房地产投资信托基金寻求生机
item.description: 新加坡停滞不前的首次公开募股市场明年将依靠房地产投资信托基金的推动。【原文：Singapore’s stagnant initial public offering market is relying on a boost next year from real estate investment trusts.】

item.title: 野村因违规被排除在数笔日元债券交易之外
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc）被排除在几笔日元债券交易的牵头管理人之外，此前日本证券监察机构称已对该经纪公司涉嫌操纵国债期货市场的行为进行了调查，并发现了违规行为。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. was excluded as lead manager for several yen bond deals after Japan’s securities watchdog said it had investigated the brokerage for suspected market manipulation in government bond futures and found violations.】

item.title: 竞标失败后，Citadel 证券寻求在中国获得自己的牌照
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的花旗证券（Citadel Securities）在竞购瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的在岸业务失败后，看到没有其他可行的收购目标，因此选择在中国建立自己的经纪业务。【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities has opted to establish its own brokerage operation in China after a failed bid for Credit Suisse’s onshore business and seeing no viable alternative takeover targets, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 中国城市放宽购房规定。香港充斥着以火热价格出售的资产。日本股市将因石场胜选而暴跌。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Chinese cities ease homebuying rules. Hong Kong is flooded with assets at fire sale prices. Japanese stocks are set to slump on Ishiba win. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 中国大城市放松购房限制后铁矿石飙升
item.description: 在中国三个最大的城市放宽购房限制后，铁矿石飙升了近 11%，从而提振了全球最大的炼钢原料消费国的需求前景。【原文：Iron ore spiked almost 11% after three of China’s biggest cities eased curbs on home-buying, bolstering the demand outlook in the world’s biggest consumer of the steel-making ingredient.】

item.title: 马来西亚表现最佳基金转投消费类股票
item.description: 据马来西亚表现最好的基金称，受林吉特走强的影响，马来西亚消费类股票将出现反弹。【原文：Malaysia’s consumer stocks are set for a bounce thanks to tailwinds from a stronger ringgit, according to the country’s top-performing fund.】

item.title: 套期保值随着中国股市的狂热而消失
item.description: 说到中国股市，人们的主要情绪已转向乐观。【原文：When it comes to Chinese equities, the dominant feeling has turned to optimism.】

item.title: 日本股市因加息担忧而下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在执政党选举引发对央行进一步加息的预期后，日本股市周一早盘将大幅下挫。交易商还将密切关注中东地区的事态发展。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to slump early Monday after ruling party elections raised expectations of further central bank interest rate hikes. Traders will also be closely watching events in the Middle East.】

item.title: 石破获胜后日本股市将因加息担忧而下跌
item.description: 石破茂在执政党领导层竞选中出人意料地获胜，引发了人们对加息的预期，日本股市很可能会因此而下跌。【原文：Japanese stocks will likely tumble after Shigeru Ishiba’s surprise victory in the ruling party’s leadership race raised expectations that interest rates will increase.】

item.title: 里德-哈斯廷斯向卡马拉-哈里斯捐款后，Netflix 取消订单激增
item.description:
在特朗普的支持者呼吁对流媒体服务采取行动后，取消服务的比例几乎增加了两倍。【原文：

Rate of cancellations almost tripled after Trump backers called for action against the streaming service.

】

item.title: 真主党领导人之死引发紧张局势，石油走高
item.description: 真主党领导人哈桑-纳斯鲁拉（Hassan Nasrallah）的遇害加剧了中东地区的紧张局势，交易商们正等待着看伊朗将如何回应，石油价格随之走高。【原文：Oil edged higher after the killing of Hezbollah’s leader, Hassan Nasrallah, stoked tensions in the Middle East, with traders waiting to see how Iran would respond.】

item.title: 沃尔沃率领 50 家企业敦促欧盟坚持内燃机禁令
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司和数十家工业制造商敦促布鲁塞尔坚持从 2035 年起停止销售新型内燃机汽车的计划。但欧洲最大的汽车制造商却保持沉默。【原文：Volvo Car AB and dozens of industrial manufacturers urged Brussels to stick to a plan to halt sales of new combustion-engine cars starting 2035. But Europe’s biggest automakers are keeping quiet.】

item.title: 中国人黄金周前往欧洲和遥远的热点地区
item.description: 黄金周假期期间，中国有数亿人外出旅游，更多中国人前往欧洲和其他遥远的热点地区，这是中国重新开放边境以来最强劲的旅游反弹迹象。【原文：More Chinese are headed to Europe and other far-flung hotspots during the Golden Week holiday that sees hundreds of millions in the country on the move, in the most robust signs of a travel rebound since the country re-opened its borders.】

item.title: 反对丰田董事长的声音在大股东中蔓延
item.description: 反对丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男的一系列汽车安全丑闻引发了人们对他的领导能力和这家全球最大汽车制造商未来的担忧，在这家日本公司的一些最大投资者中出现了反对他的声音。【原文：Opposition to Toyota Motor Corp. Chairman Akio Toyoda has surfaced among some of the Japanese company’s biggest investors, after a series of vehicle safety scandals gave rise to concerns about his leadership and the future of the world’s biggest carmaker.】

item.title: 韩元因韩国央行政策决定和债券流入尾风而关注关键水平
item.description: 在持续的债券流入和央行下周不会降息的预期支撑下，韩元有望向关键水平走强。【原文：The Korean won is poised to strengthen toward a key level, supported by ongoing bond inflows and expectations the central bank will refrain from cutting interest rates next week.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所一年一度的 "伦敦金属交易所周 "聚会正在举行，交易商和分析师在铜的最新涨势中汇聚一堂。白糖期货有望创下 1 月份以来的最佳表现。美国公用事业在 S&P 500 指数中的表现优于其他行业，部分原因是人工智能的需求。【原文：London Metal Exchange’s annual LME Week gathering is underway, bringing together traders and analysts amid copper’s latest upswing. Sugar futures are on track for their best month since January. And US utilities are outshining other industry groups in the S&P 500, thanks in part to AI demand.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Systematica 利用新型技术处理数据
item.description: 作为一名量化投资人，对冲基金经理莱达-布拉加（Leda Braga）早在 2008 年就聘请了她的第一位人工智能博士，以建立计算机主导的交易策略。最近，她需要一位新型计算机科学家。【原文：As a quant, hedge fund manager Leda Braga hired her first Ph.D. in artificial intelligence back in 2008 to build out computer-led trading strategies. Lately, she’s needed a new type of computer scientist.】

item.title: 加文-纽森否决了加州有争议的人工智能安全法案
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）否决了一项有争议的人工智能安全法案，该法案要求公司确保其人工智能模型不会造成重大伤害。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom has vetoed a contentious artificial intelligence safety bill that would have required companies to make sure their AI models don’t cause major harm.】

item.title: 恒天然提高红利政策，力争保持牛奶供应
item.description: 全球最大的乳制品出口商恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Cooperative Group）的目标是向奶农支付更高的红利，以确保保留其在新西兰牛奶采集中的份额。【原文：Fonterra Cooperative Group, the world’s biggest dairy exporter, is targeting higher dividend payments to farmers to ensure it retains its share of New Zealand milk collection.】

item.title: 奥地利极右翼赢得大选，但建制派仍将执政
item.description: 奥地利的传统政治力量承诺在周日的全国大选后阻止极右翼自由党组建政府，这标志着为阻止欧洲日益高涨的民粹主义浪潮所做的最新努力。【原文：Austria’s traditional political powers are pledging to block the far-right Freedom Party from forming a government following Sunday’s national elections, marking the latest effort to stem the rising tide of populism in Europe.】

item.title: 股票入市，债券出局：今年余下时间的热门交易
item.description: 彭博市场实时脉搏（Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse）的最新调查显示，由于美联储不断降息，美国股市在今年剩余时间内的表现将优于美国政府和公司债券。【原文：US stocks will outperform the nation’s government and corporate bonds for the rest of this year as the Federal Reserve keeps cutting interest rates, the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey shows.】
